segments.text: Here are our passports and tickets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see . Yes , here are your passports back . Did you pack your luggage yourselves ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we did . Just this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did anyone approach you to ask you to carry anything for them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . We left directly from the hostel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are these four pieces all your luggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Oh ! And these two carry-ons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better attach these stickers to your carry-ons .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are your baggage claim stubs , miss . And here are your boarding passes . Your seats are 29K and 29J . Your flight leaves at Gate 7 , and we'll be boarding in about an hour and a half .
segments.speaker: S1
